talk.author: did:plc:fssvslxmwfy3uanqi76uvsfw
talk.utter:
サザの「仲間も大事だけど、いよいよ無理だと思ったらミカヤを連れて抜ける」のやつと、エディの「この戦いが終わったら軍を抜ける！みんなも説得してやめさせる！まずはおれとおまえの2人！」が対象になってるよなぁって前にXでぬかしてたけど

これ仮にエディがサザみたいに「もう無理だから、みんなを残しておれとおまえだけでも逃げよう」なんてことになったら、レオが怪獣化したハチワレみたいに「言わないでしょそんな事ッ、言わないよねェッ」ってなるよなぁってなってた。ちょっと見たい、レオの「言わないでしょ　そんな事ッ」

talk.author: did:plc:f5daqdpegzvimecgjg43eot5
talk.utter: 私もエディとサザが同じように同じ時期に他の人に行こうと言ったのがとても興味深いです！ エディは軍隊全体を思いながらとんでもない話をして、サザはミカヤだけに現実的に話すことも··· ネバサのスラムの市民が、それはそんな癖なのでしょうか？

talk.author: did:plc:fssvslxmwfy3uanqi76uvsfw
talk.utter: Even though it seems like you don't have to touch it, if you intentionally include a similar description, I'm starting to wonder if there's some kind of purpose behind it!

talk.author: did:plc:fssvslxmwfy3uanqi76uvsfw
talk.utter:
I think both of us are tired of being in the military and want to go back to being free and not being bound by the big framework of the past.

I think that when taking that action, there is a difference in thinking depending on whether you respect the individual or respect the whole.

talk.author: did:plc:fssvslxmwfy3uanqi76uvsfw
talk.utter: Eddie also has a strong sense of belonging to the Band of the Dawn, and because he probably spent his childhood interacting with others even in the slums, I think he has a mindset of respecting everything, ``everyone!'' .

talk.author: did:plc:fssvslxmwfy3uanqi76uvsfw
talk.utter: Since Saza met Micaiah when she was a child, she has lived without interacting with others, so she does not place importance on living in a circle of people. So I thought all I needed was Micaiah.

talk.author: did:plc:fssvslxmwfy3uanqi76uvsfw
talk.utter: Sorry, this is so long and I don't know if it's a proper answer... Also, I used translation, but I'm sorry if it's difficult to understand 😭

talk.author: did:plc:fssvslxmwfy3uanqi76uvsfw
talk.utter: Even though it seems like you don't have to touch it, if you intentionally include a similar description, I'm starting to wonder if there's some kind of purpose behind it!

talk.utter:
I think both of us are tired of being in the military and want to go back to being free and not being bound by the big framework of the past.

I think that when taking that action, there is a difference in thinking depending on whether you respect the individual or respect the whole.

talk.utter: Eddie also has a strong sense of belonging to the Band of the Dawn, and because he probably spent his childhood interacting with others even in the slums, I think he has a mindset of respecting everything, ``everyone!'' .

talk.author: did:plc:fssvslxmwfy3uanqi76uvsfw
talk.utter: Sorry, this is so long and I don't know if it's a proper answer... Also, I used translation, but I'm sorry if it's difficult to understand 😭

talk.author: did:plc:f5daqdpegzvimecgjg43eot5
talk.utter: 私も同じように思います！ 二人ともネバサ出身でありながらも違う態度をとっているのが本当に興味深く、一人ずつ観察しながらもずっと思い出されます。 エディのように幼い子が兄として弟の面倒を見ることからすごいし、その一方で溌剌として外向的で…··· 逆に、サザは一人でも幸せに暮らせそうで、ミカヤを一人で選んで同行することです··· あ、これは結局ただの兄と弟の違いでしょうか？

talk.author: did:plc:f5daqdpegzvimecgjg43eot5
talk.utter: とにかく、私は正直サザが他のセビョク団の人たちとどんな灌漑なのかとても見たいです··· たしかにみんな"家族"なのに、ゲームには十分出てこないし、FEHではミカヤだけ中心にしちゃって…··· ミカヤを心から愛していますが新しいものも見たいです とても気になります

talk.author: did:plc:fssvslxmwfy3uanqi76uvsfw
talk.utter: surely! I think there is a fundamental difference between an older brother and a younger brother! Therefore, the outcome of the choice will be different, whether you are able to pay attention to the children under you or around you, or whether you only take advantage of yourself.

talk.author: did:plc:fssvslxmwfy3uanqi76uvsfw
talk.utter: For a long time in FEH, Micaiah and Saza had the same implementation as everyone in Begnion, which is a problem...I'd like to know Micaiah and Saza's thoughts and evaluations of Eddie, Leonardo, Noyce, and other members.🥹
